result.eng: They were standing in the middle of the street, handing out leaflets.
result.ga: Bhí siad ina seasamh i lár na sráide ag scaipeadh bileog

result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ina seasaṁ i lár na sráide ag scaipeaḋ bileogThey were standing in the middle of the street, handing out leaflets.

result.eng: The game stopped in the middle of the play.
result.ga: Stop an cluiche i lár na himeartha
result.orig: Stop an cluiche i lár na himeartha
result.html: Stop an cluiche i lár na himearthaThe game stopped in the middle of the play.
result.ponchtml: Stop an cluiċe i lár na himearṫaThe game stopped in the middle of the play.

result.eng: I am in the middle of the square.
result.ga: Tá mé i lár na cearnóige
result.orig: Tá mé i lár na cearnóige
result.html: Tá mé i lár na cearnóigeI am in the middle of the square.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i lár na cearnóigeI am in the middle of the square.

result.eng: I love to go to a play in the Taibhdhearc theater on Middle Street.
result.ga: Is breá liomsa dul chuig dráma sa Taibhdhearc ar an tSráid Láir
result.orig: Is breá liomsa dul chuig dráma sa Taibhdhearc ar an tSráid Láir
result.html: Is breá liomsa dul chuig dráma sa Taibhdhearc ar an tSráid LáirI love to go to a play in the Taibhdhearc theater on Middle Street.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liomsa dul ċuig dráma sa Taiḃḋearc ar an tSráid LáirI love to go to a play in the Taibhdhearc theater on Middle Street.

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.
result.ga: Sin Úna sin Niamh Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireadh
result.orig: Sin Úna sin Niamh Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireadh
result.html: Sin Úna sin Niamh Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireadh[Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.
result.ponchtml: Sin Úna sin Niaṁ Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireaḋ[Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.

result.eng: I stood in the middle of the bridge.
result.ga: Sheas mé i lár an droichid

result.ponchtml: Ṡeas mé i lár an droiċidI stood in the middle of the bridge.

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.orig: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.html: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an ċogaiḋ agus cónaí orṫu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.

result.eng: He put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
